page.content: <h3 name="d68f" id="d68f" class="graf graf--h3 graf-after--p"><span class="markup--strong markup--h3-strong">New Management</span></h3> <p name="7317" id="7317" class="graf graf--p graf-after--h3"><em class="markup--em markup--p-em">Were you hired by a general manager who just got fired? Does the franchise keep bringing up &ldquo;organizational change&rdquo; in press conferences? Did the last president of basketball operations love you, but now you&rsquo;re dealing with Steve Mills? Call the hotline now! There is no obligation.&nbsp;</em></p>

<h3>Defining Your Scheduled Task in Sitecore</h3> <p><span>If you have ever needed to upgrade or install Sitecore, then you will know a lot of your website's configuration settings are done in .config files, either in the web.config, or, the 'App_Config' directory. Creating your own custom scheduling agent is very similar.&nbsp;</span></p>

<h4 id="e257" class="graf graf--h4 graf-after--p"><span class="markup--strong markup--h4-strong">Jeff Hornacek</span></h4> <p id="4e83" class="graf graf--p graf-after--h4"><span class="markup--strong markup--p-strong">O&rsquo;Shaughnessy:&nbsp;</span>Before Hornacek&rsquo;s first season as head coach of the Knicks could even finish,&nbsp;<a class="markup--anchor markup--p-anchor" href="http://www.nj.com/knicks/index.ssf/2017/02/jeff_hornacek_on_hot_seat_vegas_odds_suggest_knick.html" rel="noopener" target="_blank" data-href="http://www.nj.com/knicks/index.ssf/2017/02/jeff_hornacek_on_hot_seat_vegas_odds_suggest_knick.html">Vegas</a>&nbsp;had him as the third most likely to be fired&nbsp;<em class="markup--em markup--p-em">in that same season</em>. The odds were loaded, of course, by the unpredictability of Phil Jackson. But unlike Hornacek, Phil did not survive the year.</p>
<p>Required fields: article title and pahge content</p> <p>Cannot add new page if the article has no pages&nbsp;</p>
